column5: Been fishing almost exclusively for musky this past week by myself and two evenings with a Father and son staying at Indian Point Camp where I guide from time to time. Iâ€™m relatively new to the musky game, and scoffed at people when they told me itâ€™s addictive, I have to admit I have an addictionâ€¦. ğŸ˜‚. Been raising fish, follows, and heartbreaking losses before getting the net under them, too many to even put a number to, but did put some in the boat.
Beauty trophies... 	Oh boy, you are fishing so far away from me
Awesome fish! nice work! How big is the one in the third picture?
beauties! especially the 3rd one. After fishing almost exclusively for muskies the past 20 years I gotta admit, a bit of a salmon obsession is creeping in on me now as well

I never got a tape on it, it was such a shambles netting and unhooking all by myself in almost complete darkness I thought it best to get it in the water again ASAP, it swam away happily. My initial thoughts were over 50â€, and looking at the picture my guess is well over 50â€. Itâ€™s head across the top from gillÂ plate to gillÂ Â plate must have been 9â€, a really scary beast! Iâ€™m 6â€™2â€ and if I held it up it would come up to my chest at least, I think it was just under 60â€ but I guess Iâ€™ll never know or be able to prove it, but Iâ€™m counting myself in the over 50â€ no matter what anyone says.
Some nice fish there Simon and just for a comparison to help you guesstimate the size of that last one here's a fish that was accurately measured at 54.5 inches.
Wow! Monster! I gotta start fishing way up there sometime

good for you! My second musky ever was a true beast (of course all of em look like a beast when you are new to muskies!) but I also figured I was a part of the 50" club...I did not measure it either. When they are that big, you just know. My buddies did razz me about it, so when I did catch another over 50 I made sure to measure it and make it official. Congrats on an awesome fish
Congrats on some big fish. That one (from looking at a picture) is over 55â€. 	Â A true giant for sure.
